welcome_message_body: Welcome to Saddiqabad, Pakistan, a city known for its rich history and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore our charming streets, try our delicious local cuisine, and immerse yourself in the beauty of our city. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Cafe Sajawal
restaurants.description: Cafe Sajawal is a asian restaurant located in Sādiqābād.

restaurants.name: McDonald's
restaurants.description: McDonald's is a fast food restaurant located in Sadiqabad, District Rahim Yar Khan.

terminals.description: The main terminal serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
